newsitem.title: UK: CRICKET-ENGLISH COUNTY CHAMPIONSHIP CLOSE SCORES.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-ENGLISH COUNTY CHAMPIONSHIP CLOSE SCORES.

text.p: Close of play scores on the second day of four-day English county championship cricket matches on Wednesday:
At Edgbaston (Birmingham): Essex 238 and 113-1 (G.Gooch 58 not out), Warwickshire 253 (W.Khan 126)
At Trent Bridge (Nottingham): Nottinghamshire 324 (K.Evans 71), Leicestershire 341-5 (V.Wells 119, J.Whitaker 116 not out)
At Southampton: Glamorgan 401 (S.James 103, H.Morris 80, R.Croft 67, A.Shaw 53; D.Mascarenhas 6-88), Hampshire 193-2 (J.Laney 102 not out, G.White 70)
At Taunton: Derbyshire 524 (A.Rollins 127, K.Krikken 89, D.Cork 77, P.DeFreitas 60, G.Roberts 52), Somerset 238-4 (M.Lathwell 109)
At Old Trafford (Manchester): Middlesex 160 and 231 (K.Brown 83, M.Gatting 50), Lancashire 262 (S.Titchard 67; P.Tufnell 6-74)
At Worcester: Sussex 219, Worcestershire 413-9 declared (D.Leatherdale 122, S.Rhodes 110, T.Curtis 61)
At The Oval (London): Surrey 395 and 82-1, Northamptonshire 235 (D.Ripley 55; B.Julian 6-37)
